version_description:
Improvement
- Mail 2 APM : Addresses in 'To:', 'Cc:', 'Bcc' interactions
- Mail 2 APM : Ask for confirmation on comment element removal
- Mail 2 APM : Draft mail in activity : look & feel
- Mail 2 APM : Label 'Cancel' replaced by 'Close' o

Improvement
- Labels : QuickMenu enhancement when multiple mailboxes
- Main interface : iPad pro compatibility
- Main interface : Remove app badge if background refresh is deactivated

Bug correction
- Companies - Contacts : Custom field

Improvement
- New SmartList module available from main menu
- Document - Workflow : New menu entry in DM Module to find quickly all entries waiting for "my approval"
- Settings : Incremental settings refresh
- SmartList : Clear iCloud data fro

Improvement
- SmartList : Do not delete a new task when deleting all characters

Bug correction
- Settings : Crashs during settings refresh
- SmartList : Crashs when changing notebook layout

Improvement
- Activity : All activities list ordering improvements
- Activity - Contacts - Document - Mails : New icons in swipeable cells
- Activity - Mails : Adding mail recipients made easier
- Activity - Mails : Recipients list displayed i

Bug correction

- Mails : Inbox becomes empty
- Mails : Visual glitch when mass selecting e-mails
- Search : Bug in date selection in manual search

- Add "Yesterday" section in mail lists
- Misc. bugfixes

Bug correction

- Activity : App crashes when "Take Photo" option is selected
- Activity : Date additional fields completed automatically
- Activity : Old entry stays even after refresh
- Activity : Sections color in "All activities"
- L
- Problem solving which prevented iPad users to create APM, see their contacts and so on.

- Using company filter from the document list is now working perfectly
- You can now use the decimal sign on specific fields from an APM
- Miscellaneous bug fixes.

Improvements:
- Activity : "Go to" address linked to activity
- Document : Readonly custom fields view with quick access
- Settings : Ability to focus password field when password has expired
- Workflow : Add red background colour to mandatory

Improvement:
- GDPR Compliant.

Bug fixes:
- Custom fields of a DM were not visible anymore.
